text: The 2016 Australian Superkart season is a national level Superkart in Australia. There are three classes, 250cc International, 250cc National and 150cc National. ==Teams and drivers== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !Team !Class !Chassis !No !Driver !Round |- |
